Description: Powered by Frooition Pro Shop Search 2005 Fender Stevie Ray Vaughan Stratocaster Electric Guitar Sunburst SRV w/Case Click here to view full size. Full Size ImageClick to close full size. Item Description 2006 Fender Stevie Ray Vaughan Stratocaster in excellent condition with little to no playwear. This guitar has been babied. Beautiful 3-tone sunburst finish on the Alder body with a black engraved SRV pickguard and gold hardware. The guitar has a great action and the special deep oval shaped maple neck with a 12" radius Pao Ferro fretboard with gorgeous grain patterns, feels great. The Dunlop 6105 jumbo frets are in excellent condition. The Fender Texas Special single-coil pickups have a great SRV tone with good output. The guitar is equipped with a left handed vintage style tremolo and vintage style tuners. Looks, plays and sounds great. Huge fat tone! Includes Fender hard shell case, tremolo arm and all the hang tags. Serial number SZ6004077 Weight 7 lbs 12 oz. The Stevie Ray Vaughan Signature model respectfully replicates Stevie's favorite guitar. Pure Texas blues - Stevie style! Unique features include a special "oval" neck shape, Pao Ferro fingerboard, 3 Fender Texas Special single-coil pickups and a gold-plated vintage hardware with left-handed tremolo. Key Features: Body: AlderNeck: MapleFingerboard: Pao Ferro (12 in. Radius/305 mm)Scale Length: 25.5 in. (648 mm)No. of Frets: 21 (Dunlop 6105 Jumbo Frets)Width @ Nut: 1.650 in. Title: 2005 Fender Stevie Ray Vaughan Stratocaster Electric Guitar Sunburst SRV w/Case
ConditionDescription:
2006 Fender Stevie Ray Vaughan Stratocaster in excellent condition with little to no playwear. This guitar has been babied. Beautiful 3-tone sunburst finish on the Alder body with a black engraved SRV pickguard and gold hardware. The guitar has a great action and the special deep oval shaped maple neck with a 12" radius Pao Ferro fretboard with gorgeous grain patterns, feels great. The Dunlop 6105 jumbo frets are in excellent condition. The Fender Texas Special single-coil pickups have a great SRV tone with good output. The guitar is equipped with a left handed vintage style tremolo and vintage style tuners. Looks, plays and sounds great. Huge fat tone! 

Includes Fender hard shell case, tremolo arm and all the hang tags. 

Serial number SZ6004077 

Weight     7 lbs       12 oz.
